attributes.contentHtml: Oliver1234dotdot first of all, I asked Oreo to make this thread for me I didn’t want to have to make an account again. This thread does have a purpose, I literally asked you two questions that had no toxicity or disrespect implied and you bursted out with a rude attitude and whatnot. You told another member that was "“defending" you that you’re too busy to show him the rules because you’re playing roblox yet you claim to be a business or whatever. I have nothing against you personally but I highly recommend you get your act together and quit acting like a fool.

attributes.bio: i am a winterhoax mod ok guys
